hero.description: Beyond simple checklists, secure regulatory compliance and technical safety with 'AI Governance Orchestrator', guarding the entire AI model lifecycle based on data.

architecture.title: 3-Layer Integrated Architecture
architecture.description: We propose a seamless risk management system from planning to operation.

governance.title: Governance Layer
governance.desc: Proactively determines suitability in the planning stage based on legal (AI Act, etc.) databases.

technical.title: Technical Validation
technical.desc: Analyzes data and models directly to measure bias, security (Red Teaming), and explainability.

monitoring.title: Monitoring Layer
monitoring.desc: Detects performance degradation (Drift) and anomalies in operating models in real-time to prevent incidents.

command_center.title: Real-time Risk Command Center
command_center.description: Grasp the risk status of enterprise AI services at a glance. Support immediate decision-making through a traffic light system (Green, Yellow, Red) and automate reporting by visualising regulatory compliance status.

scanner.title: AI Scanners
scanner.desc: Automatically scans source code and datasets to detect PII exposure and security vulnerabilities.

agent.title: sLLM Governance Agent
agent.desc: When latest precedents and guidelines are updated, it cross-references existing service definitions to re-evaluate risk factors.

escalation.title: Incident Escalation
escalation.desc: Sends immediate alerts upon sudden model accuracy drops or harmful content generation, and initiates 'Emergency Stop' if necessary.

sllm.title: sLLM Automation System
sllm.desc: Utilizes sLLM to fully automate AI risk assessment, compliance verification, and bias analysis, operable independently in on-premise environments.

cta_footer.title: Secure AI Safety Now.
cta_footer.description: We propose a governance framework optimized for your AI service through expert consultation.

risk_card.title: Credit Assessment AI Model v2.0
risk_card.desc: Compliance with Financial Protection Act & Bias Verification Required

nav.assessment_desc: High-impact AI detection and legal review

project_create.title: AI service project creation

pre_review_request.title: Pre-review request
pre_review_request.description: Request pre-review and set the scope of review.

risk_assessment.title: Risk / impact / safety assessment
risk_assessment.description: Assess risk, impact, and safety and determine the grade.

pre_review_result.title: Pre-review result
pre_review_result.description: Review pre-review results and decide on follow-up actions.

dev_plan.title: AI model development plan
dev_plan.description: Establish and register the AI model development plan.

risk_level_judge.title: Risk level decision
risk_level_judge.description: Choose the next step according to the determined risk level.

risk_plan_approval.title: Risk management plan approval
risk_plan_approval.description: Approve the risk management plan. (Low/medium risk)

governance_approval.title: Governance committee pre-approval
governance_approval.description: Request and confirm pre-approval from the governance committee. (High risk)

dev_request.title: AI service development request (ITSM)
dev_request.description: Request development via ITSM and enter linkage information.

pre_op_verification.title: Pre-operation verification
pre_op_verification.description: Perform pre-operation verification and register results.

verification_branch.title: Verification path by risk level
verification_branch.description: Choose verification adequacy confirmation or third-party verification by risk level.

verification_adequacy.title: Verification result adequacy
verification_adequacy.description: Confirm adequacy of verification results. (Medium risk)

third_party_verification.title: Third-party verification request/result
third_party_verification.description: Request third-party verification and register results. (High risk)

deployment_approval.title: Risk management compliance & deployment approval
deployment_approval.description: Confirm risk management compliance and approve deployment.

deployment.title: AI service deployment
deployment.description: Deploy the AI service and manage deployment history.

improvement.title: Improvement plan / management
improvement.description: Establish improvement plans and manage execution.

flow.revision_return: Return to planning/model doc after revision

guidelines.title: Assessment Guidelines
items: Finance, Healthcare, and HR fields are likely to be classified as 'High-Impact AI'.
Algorithm transparency is mandatory based on the EU AI Act and local AI laws.
Results are cross-referenced with the real-time legal DB by the sLLM agent.

templates.compliance_check_content:
Please verify the compliance status of the following Energy AI System:

System Info:
- Name: {system_name}
- Category: {category}
- Processed Data: {data_types}

Regulations to Verify:
- AI Basic Act (High-impact AI notification duty)
- Personal Information Protection Act (Consent for processing)
- Electricity Business Act (Safety standards for power facilities)
- Energy Use Rationalization Act (Energy efficiency standards)

Please specify compliance status for each regulation and necessary actions if non-compliant.

energy_intro.hero_desc: Experience the power of AI-driven consultation. We help you navigate complex regulations, generate compliance documents, and optimize your energy AI services securely.
energy_intro.solutions_desc: Connect seamlessly with our suite of AI governance tools tailored for the energy sector.

features.flow_desc: AI assists in every step of the governance flow, from planning to operation.

energy_intro.philosophy_desc: Our platform isn't just a tool; it's your AI partner. By combining Human Intelligence with specialized sLLM, we ensure your products meet stringent energy regulations while maximizing efficiency.

flow_consult.report_desc: Tailored insights based on your inputs and regulations.

flow_consult.mock_planning: Analyzing your comment '{comment}', this feature likely falls into High-Risk AI. Measure for data bias prevention are needed from the planning phase.
flow_consult.mock_dev: To comply with '{regulation}', XAI modules must be mandatorily included during model development.
flow_consult.mock_op: Shorten real-time monitoring cycles during operation and establish immediate rollback procedures for anomalies.
flow_consult.mock_intro: Optimized the AI governance framework based on your collaboration.
